TopicTitle: Editing MNA in saves no longer works?

Articles.Content: G'day All. It seems that editing the MNA values in persistence.sfs no longer seems to work? I want to align 4 commsats so that I don't need to go back and correct their orbits every couple of years... But it seems that doing so no longer seems to have an effect (they ended up wandering pretty quickly actually).

Assuming you've copied the entire ORBIT block from your reference probe, and only then modified the MNA value to space them out, it should work fine. I believe MNA is measured in radians, if that helps.
Yep, that's what I did. And, yeah, spaced out the sats at MNA = 0, pi/2, pi and 3pi/2.
